com.spotify.flo.context

Interface InstrumentedContext.Listener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    Enclosing class:
    InstrumentedContext

    public static interface InstrumentedContext.Listener
extends Closeable
    A listener for instrumented evaluation. See InstrumentedContext for more details.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  InstrumentedContext.Listener.Phase
      The different phases of task evaluation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void close()
      Called to close resources or connections used by the implementing class.
      void status(TaskId task, InstrumentedContext.Listener.Phase phase)
      Called when a task starts and finished it's evaluation.
      void task(Task<?> task)
      Called when a Task is discovered.

    • Method Detail

      • task

        void task(Task<?> task)
        Called when a Task is discovered.
        Parameters:
        task - The discovered task object

      • status

        void status(TaskId task,
            InstrumentedContext.Listener.Phase phase)
        Called when a task starts and finished it's evaluation. This will be called exactly twice per evaluation of a task.
        Parameters:
        task - The task that is being evaluated
        phase - The phase of evaluation

      • close

        default void close()
            throws IOException
        Called to close resources or connections used by the implementing class.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Throws:
        IOException
